name: Unobtainable Mines
description: MAKE SURE TO PRESS THE ESCAPE KEY AND 'SAVE AND LOAD' BEFORE EXITING THE GAME!   Click to move forward toward your mouse. To enter the upgrade station  drive up to it (it might take a few tries). Currently the end goal of the game is to get the upgrade 'Transdimensional Drills'.  Sadly due to some, errrr, "code fixing" the code is no longer usable and I don't want to put in the time to make it work again so there is basically no chance of any updates.
